channel.title: CVE Feed for na/ -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for na/ -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-14180|2024-09-16T20:41:50.800Z -- na%2F -- apport
item.description: Apport 2.13 through 2.20.7 does not properly handle crashes originating from a PID namespace allowing local users to create certain files as root which an attacker could leverage to perform a denial of service via resource exhaustion or possibly gain root privileges, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-14179.
